Smart Entry & Start System
Black leather seats

mdata.expanded:
17" alloy wheels
Nagara black leather seats

Smart Start
Rear window sunshades
LED daytime running lamps
Full Smart Entry
Reverse Camera
mdata.xhtml:
The Prius+ Hybrid T Spirit includes features such as:

Toyota Touch & Go Plus Multimedia and Navigation System with 8 JBL Speakers, Bluetooth and Reversing Camera
Nagara Black Leather Seats
17” Alloy Wheels

derivatives.description: Excel 1.8 VVT-i Hybrid Protection Park

mdata.expanded:
Park with confidence with the Prius+ Park Pack. This unique pack includes: Toyota Parking Assist front main kit
Toyota Parking Assist front cancellation switch
Front sensors
Toyota Parking Assist rear main kit
Rear cancellation switch and sensors

Protect your Prius+ with the specially designed protection pack. This cost effective pack includes: Front and rear mud flaps
Bumper corner protectors
Boot liner
Scuff plates

derivatives.description: Excel 1.8 VVT-i Hybrid Panoramic Roof Technology

mdata.expanded:
Enjoy cutting edge technology with this intuitive pack designed to bring added convenience and safety to your Prius+ Excel for a more enjoyable drive. The technology pack includes: Toyota Touch Pro Navigation
Pre-Crash safety system
Adaptive cruise control
Intelligent park assist
LED Headlamps with Dusk Sensors
Front heated seats
Auto rear view mirror
(Please note – the technology pack is only available when Panoramic Roof Option is selected)
Add the Panoramic Roof to enjoy the best of the world. This fixed glass roof fills the Prius+’s interior with natural light and features an electric sunshade blind for added convenience.

CO2: 101g/km
Power (DIN hp): 136
BIK: 12%
mdata.expanded:
Fuel Economy (Combined): 64.2 mpg (4.4 l/100km)
C02 Emissions: 101g/km
Benefit in Kind Taxation: 12%
Acceleration 0-62 mph (0-100kmh): 11.3 secs
Top Speed :103 mph (165 km/h)
Power: 136 DIN hp
Torque: 104 lbft (142 Nm)

mdata.xhtml:
The Prius+ Hybrid T4 includes features such as:

Toyota Touch Multimedia System with 6 Speakers, Bluetooth and Reversing Camera
Full Smart Entry & Start System
Leather Steering Wheel
Cruise control
Electric Lumbar Support
16” Alloy Wheels with Wheel Caps
Front & Rear Electric Windows
